rooms.text:
You awaken in a cell, the gate North of you is open
A small torch East from you vaguely illuminates the room.
You can see the silhouette of something on the wall to the West
rooms.west: On the wall to the West you see the silhouette of a katana
rooms.east:
A small torch -- it looks like it's been burning for a while.
It looks as if it could die at any moment...
Yet still carries on.
rooms.north:
An open doorway.
Perhaps whatever you're in this cell for has run its course.
rooms.south:
A wall you've been resting on for a while.
Don't look too close or you'll feel disgusted for resting on it.

rooms.text:
You enter a stairwell leading down (North).
The room you've arrived in splits off,
to a room to the East and one to the West.
rooms.north:
You see a mural illuminated by torchlight.
Most of it has worn away,
but you can still see what's left of a radiant-blue blade.
rooms.west:
Beyond the doorway is what looks like Greek architecture...
You can see pillars holding up the ceiling in the dim room.
rooms.east: A doorway leading to what looks like the interior of a colosseum.
rooms.south: The stairs lead upwards to the prison chamber you awakened in

rooms.text:
The room before you looks like a small combat arena.
You can see what remains of a mighty greatsword before you.
There are also two monsters to your east
rooms.north:
The rusted remains of a greatsword are firmly planted into the ground.
Beyond that is the exit.
rooms.east:
Three monsters eye you with contempt;
They look like they could strike at any moment
rooms.west: The entrance to the split path you came from
rooms.south: The bloodstained walls of this arena tell a story of years of brutal violence.

rooms.text:
You enter a small room.
There's an exit to the west
rooms.north: A small potion lays on a table
rooms.west: An open doorway
rooms.east: Nothing of interest
rooms.south: The column-filled room you entered from

rooms.text:
You enter a dimly-lit room full of columns which hold up the ceiling.
You can see a Greek broadhead spear between two pillars North of you.
rooms.north:
A 'dory' with a cracked broadhead held between two columns.
Beyond that is the exit.
rooms.west:
Two monsters sitting by the remains of another human.
You can tell they'll strike you if you try to leave.
rooms.east: The entrance to the split path you came from
rooms.south:
A mural telling the story of Leonidus,
who grazed King Xerxes with the throw of his spear.

rooms.text:
You enter a small room.
There's an exit to the east
rooms.north: A small potion lays on a table
rooms.west: Nothing of interest
rooms.east: An open doorway
rooms.south: The column-filled room you entered from

rooms.text:
You enter a small hallway,
there's an exit North
rooms.north: An open doorway leading to somewhere indescernable
rooms.west: A rather odd lounge
rooms.east: A quaint little break room
rooms.south: A large brick wall

rooms.text:
You enter a well-lit and grand hallway
The walls and floor look almost as if they were made of gold.
The North is guarded by two gargantuan skeletons:
You can't tell if they're animate or not
rooms.north: A large gateway with a green and red keyhole
rooms.east:
A door that looks to lead to a very dark room.
It has an emblem of a canvas on it
rooms.west:
A door that looks to lead to a dark room.
This one has the emblem of an alchemist's laboratory on it.
rooms.south: The hallway you entered from

rooms.text:
You enter a dim room with texts and tools of the dark arts scattered about.
There's a desk North of you that has a red key behind a statue of a Sphinx.
rooms.north:
A statue of a Sphinx is on the desk,
surrounded by miscellaneous alchemy equipment.
You can see the inanimate sphinx statue...gazing at you.
Perhaps you should operate it to see what it wants.
rooms.south:
Bookshelves litter the southern half of this lab:
Each filled with great tomes on alchemy, witchcraft and other esoteric crafts.
rooms.west: You see a cell...It looks moist, dark and abandoned.
rooms.east: The entrance back to the hallway you came from.

rooms.text:
You awaken in a dark and mouldy cell...
There's an open gate to the east.
However, there's a wolf growling - ready to pounce, looking directly at you.
rooms.north: A wolf-like creature -- crouched down, gazing upon you with its fangs bared.
rooms.south:
Chains coated in a perpetually moving substance hang from the walls.
You can also see a shortsword
rooms.east: A gateway to the alchemy room

rooms.text:
You enter a small art gallery:
Paintings litter the walls,
you can operate the paintings to collect all of them.
rooms.north:
The wall at the end of the gallery has several hooks for hanging paintings.
A wooden panel has the following carved on it:
"From cradle to grave, a series of works"
rooms.west: The grand hallway you came from
rooms.east: A series of paintings
rooms.south: Assorted artworks -- they all look quite exquisite.

rooms.text:
You enter what looks like a break room:
There're 2 potions neatly placed on a tea table.
You can also see three diverging doors.
rooms.north: An iron door emblazoned with the emblem of a helmet & a soup ladle.
rooms.west:
An iron door with several cut chains and locks on it.
It looks broken and remains open.
rooms.east:
A wooden doorway that looks as if it's been broken down
and rebuilt a myriad of times.

rooms.text:
You enter a dark hall...
There's an uncomfortably low shuffling sound that can be heard to the east.
rooms.north:
Dark stone pillars hold up the ceiling.
You can see torches attached to them
rooms.south: You see a potion laying on the ground
rooms.east:
A slightly ajar iron door...
It leads to the source of the shuffling
rooms.west: The entrance to the tea room

rooms.text:
You enter the torture chamber.
The room allows for you to move to the north and east.
rooms.north:
You can see two silhouettes flickering;
They move in & out of sight like candles.
rooms.east: You can see some form of mechanical device illuminated by torchlight.
rooms.south: A brick lined with torches & stained with blood lays before you

rooms.text:
You enter one sect of then torture chamber
To the South is some sort of mechanism.
It looks like there's something large to the North as well.
rooms.south:
Before you is a gargantuan wheel-like mechanism of torture
One can only imagine the pain this has brought upon the world.
There's a potion placed on it.
rooms.north:
You can vaguely make out the figure of what looks like
a man-sized device in the distance
rooms.east: A brick wall lined with chains, leather straps and stains of blood
rooms.west: You can see the entrance to the torture chamber off to the distance

rooms.text:
North of you is an iron maiden.
Glimmering on the wall east of you is the imprint of where a key belongs,
hanging from a rusted chain.
rooms.north:
Chains firmly seal the iron maiden shut,
yet something presses and bangs against them.
You can engage the chains to open the iron maiden
rooms.south: You see the sect of the torture chamber with the wheel-like contraption
rooms.east:
A key with the emblem of a rope on it.
Below it is an enormous axe used by an executioner.
rooms.west: A mostly empty section of the torture chamber.

rooms.text:
You enter a mostly empty part of the torture chamber,
save for the meat-hooks attached to chains swaying about the place.
rooms.north: Two monsters lurch about amongst the chains
rooms.west: A brick wall lined with chains, leather straps and stains of blood
rooms.east:
You can vaguely make out the figure of what looks like
a man-sized device in the distance
rooms.south:
You see the entrance to the torture chamber.
The light looks so promising admist the gloom this area exerts.

rooms.text: You enter a massive - sprawling food court
rooms.north:
North of you, on the floor,
is a knight's halberd
rooms.south: The entrance to the tea-room
rooms.west: The path to the west has a statue of a chef
rooms.east: The path to the east has a butcher's cleaver on the floor

rooms.text:
To the south is a statue of a chef
North contains another section of the food court.
rooms.north: You see a stone fork on the floor in the section North of you
rooms.south:
A statue of a chef.
Operate it to change what it's holding
rooms.east: The entrance of the food court is East of you
rooms.west: You see a spotless white wall

rooms.text: You enter a mostly empty part of the food court...
rooms.north: In the section North of you, there's a dazzling set of armour.
rooms.south:
South of you is a knight-zombie,
shambling about the mostly pristine dining hall --
Harshly contrasting the mostly white paint that makes up the walls and ceiling.
rooms.east: You see a butcher's cleaver on the floor
rooms.west: The entrance of the food court is West of you

rooms.text:
You enter east-middle section of the food court.
To the east, you can see a bejewled knight's armour, holding something.
rooms.north: At the eastern end of the food court, you can see a pot on a shelf with something atop it.
rooms.east:
You see a knight's armour -- a true spectacle to the eyes,
at least given the myriad of jewels adorning it
rooms.west: On the section to the west of you, you can vaguely make out a stone fork on the ground.
rooms.south: The south-east corner of the food court

rooms.text:
You enter the west-middle section of the food court.
To your west is a stone fork on the floor.
rooms.south: A knight-zombie is shambling about the mostly empty food court.
rooms.north:
You see the west-end of the food court.
A statue of a slab of meat appears to be there.
rooms.east: You see the central part of the food court.
rooms.west: On the floor west of you is a large stone fork.

rooms.text: You enter the direct centre of the food court.
rooms.north:
Tables and chairs litter the area:
This appears to be the main place where people congregate while eating.
rooms.east: You see a knight's armour to the section east of you
rooms.west: On the section to the west of you, you can vaguely make out a stone fork on the ground.
rooms.south: You can see the entrance of the food court

rooms.text:
You enter the east end of the food court.
North of you is a pot with something on top of it...
rooms.north:
A large pot without a lid...
Perhaps you could place something atop it.
rooms.south: The east-centre of the food court
rooms.east: A large assortement of tables and chairs blocks your path
rooms.west: You see a spotless white wall

rooms.text:
You enter the west end of the food court.
North of you is a stone sculpture of a slab of meat.
rooms.north:
There's a stone slab of meat with a divide in it...
Perhaps you could fit something in it.
rooms.south: The west-centre of the food court
rooms.west: A large assortement of tables and chairs blocks your path
rooms.east: You see a spotless white wall

rooms.text:
You enter a dark hallway.
Chains drape from upwards and follow you forward.
rooms.west: An open doorway -- it's too dark to make out where it leads
rooms.east: The entrance to the tea room
rooms.north: You see a potion laying on the ground
rooms.south: Chains and such litter the walls and ceiling.

rooms.text:
You enter the holding cell-area for prisoners.
You can see something narrow and shining admist the ditritus,
 and dust in one cell.
There's also an open doorway to the north.
rooms.north: An open doorway leading out of the holding cell room.
rooms.south: You see an open cell with a stiletto knife inside
rooms.east: The entrance to the dark hallway, leading back to the tea room

rooms.text: You enter a small room -- the wardens office.
rooms.north:
North of you is a gate with two keyholes.
One has a rope insignia on it.
The other has a helmet insignia.
rooms.west: A potion is sitting on the wardens desk.
rooms.east: A bottle of some sort is on the floor
rooms.south: The exit back to the holding cells

rooms.text:
You enter the execution room,
Before you are three skeletons and a guillotine.
The guillotine has a sign on it, saying
"Bring forth the head of justice!"
rooms.north: To the North is a guillotine.
rooms.east:
East of you are two skeletons in temporary stocks;
They died ready for execution.
The first one has a name tag that says "Sir Sampson of Camelot - Desertion"
The second one has a name tag that says "Roa - charged with Vigilantism"
rooms.west:
West of you is a skeleton in temporary stocks.
The skeleton has a crown and regal robes.
Around its neck is a sign saying "King Xavier - Charged with Treason"
rooms.south: The exit back to the wardens office

rooms.text:
You enter the back room of an arena.
There are doors North & West of you.
There's also a fountain to the East.
rooms.north:
You see a large gateway leading to the arena...
You could operate the Arena-Gate
rooms.south:
You see a blank wall...
How exactly did you get here?
On the floor are several bottles neatly layed down, alongside a katana.
rooms.west:
You see a large gate labelled "ARMOURY"
You could operate the Armoury-Gate
rooms.east:
To the east is a grand fountain.
It looks like it could heal you.

rooms.text: You're at the entrance of the arena.
rooms.north: The central section of the arena
rooms.south: South of you is the exit, leading to the back room
rooms.east: East of you is a section of the arena swarming with skeletons
rooms.west:
West of you is a section of the arena where the corpses and skeletons
littering the place appear to be pulverized by something titanic.

rooms.text:
You find yourself in the center of an arena.
The scent of death and the fury of battle cloud your senses.
You look around for something to kill.
(engage monsters to fight anywhere in the arena)
rooms.north: The section north of you contains a mighty minotaur guarding the exit.
rooms.south:
The section south of you contains the entrance to the arena;
Perhaps you can get to the back room again.
rooms.east: The section east of you has a desk containing an assortment of bottles.
rooms.west: The section west of you may have something to kill

rooms.text: You arrive in the South-East end of the Arena
rooms.north: To the North, you see an assortment of tinctures and potions on a desk.
rooms.east: You see several skeletons - looking ready to fight
rooms.west: The section west of you leads to the entrance of the arena.
rooms.south: There's a potion on the floor to the South

rooms.text: You enter the South-West end of the Arena.
rooms.north: To the section North, you see a skeleton sitting still.
rooms.south: There's a potion on the floor to the South
rooms.east: The section east of you leads to the entrance of the arena.
rooms.west: You see a gargantuan ape - it looks like it could crush you within an instant

rooms.text: You enter the East-central section of the Arena
rooms.north: North of you is the North-East end of the Arena
rooms.east:
A selection of elixirs stands before you.
Among them, a black one takes your interest.
rooms.west: To the west, you see the central section of the Arena.
rooms.south: To the south is the South-East end of the Arena

rooms.text: You arrive in the West-Central section of the Arena.
rooms.north: North of you is the North-West end of the Arena.
rooms.south: South of you is the South-West end of the Arena.
rooms.west:
West of you are two monsters:
An owl demon and a skeletal gladiator.
rooms.east: East of you is the central section of the Arena.

rooms.text: You arrive in the North-West end of the Arena.
rooms.north: North of you is an owl demon, accompanied by others
rooms.south: The West-Central section of the Arena.
rooms.west: A potion is on the floor
rooms.east:
East of you is the central-end of the Arena
It also contains the exit of the Arena.

rooms.text: You arrive in the North-East end of the Arena.
rooms.north:
North of you is a Stolas.
An owl-like demon with limitless arcane power.
rooms.south: The East-Central section of the Arena.
rooms.east: A potion is on the floor
rooms.west:
West of you is the central-end of the Arena
It also contains the exit of the Arena.

rooms.text: You arrive at the central-exit of the Arena
rooms.north:
North of you is a gateway leading to the exit of the Arena.
A light spills through it -- the exit of this entire place.
rooms.east: The North-East end of the Arena.
rooms.west: The North-West end of the Arena.
rooms.south: The central section of the Arena
